original_title: The Firm - Cardio Sculpt Blaster Workout
overview: This successful workout keeps you motivated with interesting new moves! Popular FIRM® Master Instructor Lisa Kay lead you through a fun and exciting mix of cardio exercises, both on the floor and using The Body Sculpting System®. This exciting new workout delivers maximum fat burning and motivates you to move, sculpt and blast your body.
title: The Firm - Cardio Sculpt Blaster Workout
